issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of abortion access and women's reproductive healthcare, opposing restrictions on reproductive choice

issues.title: Gun Control
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive gun safety legislation, including universal background checks and assault weapons ban

issues.title: Climate Change
issues.description: Supports Green New Deal framework, promotes renewable energy investment and emissions reduction policies

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding Affordable Care Act, reducing prescription drug costs, protecting Medicare and Medicaid

issues.title: LGBTQ+ Rights
issues.description: Consistent advocate for comprehensive anti-discrimination protections, marriage equality, and transgender rights

issues.title: Child Care and Family Support
issues.description: Promotes increased federal funding for childcare, paid family leave, and early childhood education programs

issues.title: Digital Privacy
issues.description: Advocates for stronger consumer data protection, tech industry regulation, and online privacy rights

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, pathway to citizenship, and protecting DACA recipients
